name: Experiential Design Lab
tag_list: experience-design, experiential-design, experiential-marketing, design, interaction-design, user-experience, product-innovation, service-design, retail-design, event-design-
overview:
Experiential Design Lab is a full service interaction design consultancy, focused on user experience, innovation and business development.

Experiential Design Lab designs and implements compelling and successful user experiences that enrich clients offerings and enable them to develop their businesses.

Experiential Design Lab offers services to companies that develop technology-based products, services, architectures or events to gain, or increase, their competitive advantage and move to the forefront in their markets. It is a company specialized in using design methodologies to develop innovation and business potential for its clients. This company is supported by an extensive and consolidated network of suppliers and partners in India and Italy.

Over the past years, Experiential Design Lab has helped many clients, including Indian Government, Rajeev Sethi, Barilla, Simple Tv, Nokia India, NIFT Institute, increase and improve their offering.

offices.address1: N-84 Second Floor, Abul Fazal, Jamia Nagar
